attributes.action: provide more money to the car companies going green.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this government is constantly asking us to be "greener" and expecting car manafacturers to be producing greener cars with less emissions. this research and development costs money and with the proposed higher taxes on cars and road use this will lead to profits falling for car manafacturers so less money to spend on "green" developments. is it not about time the government subsidised such companies.
